attributes.additional_details: I wasn’t 25 when I found out and if I had Waited till I was 25 or even later I don’t know what’s the outcome for me would have been I wanna tell my story to help over woman to be seen earlier so they don’t have to wait until 25 and find out that they may have already had cervical cancer
attributes.background:
When I was 24 I found out I was cin3 
Pre cancers cells found on cervix I didn’t get  diagnosed Through a smear test I had symptoms and went to the gp and treatment was provided and they were removed it goes in stages cin1 cin2 cin3 then Cervical cancer I would like it to be lower to 21

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar, as reducing the age to 18 would include people at 21. You might want to support and share this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242330
